citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The most recent semiannual evaluation and report to the Institutional Official(IO) was not approved by a majority of the
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) at the time of inspection. The September 2022 semiannual
evaluation and report to the IO was completed, but not approved and signed by a majority of the IACUC. Reports to the
IO shall be reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC and updated at least once every six months upon completion
of the required semiannual evaluations.
Corrected during inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The most recent semiannual evaluation and report to the Institutional Official(IO) was not approved by a majority of the 
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) at the time of inspection.  The September 2022 semiannual 
evaluation and report to the IO was completed, but not approved and signed by a majority of the IACUC.  Reports to the 
IO shall be reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC and updated at least once every six months upon completion 
of the required semiannual evaluations. 
 
Corrected during inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian. 
 
End Section
